member.name: T:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.ArithmeticOps
member.summary: This class represents all of the arithmetic operations.

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.ArithmeticOps.OverallSum(System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the overall sum of the incoming list of numbers.
member.param: List of numbers that are comma separated.

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.ArithmeticOps.OverallDifference(System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the overall difference in the list of numbers.
member.param: List of numbers that are coming in, which are also comma separated.
member.returns: Integer that represents the overall difference between the numbers in the array.

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.ArithmeticOps.OverallProduct(System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the overall product - multiplying all of the elements in the list together.
member.param: The list of numbers.

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.ArithmeticOps.OverallDivision(System.String)
member.summary: This calculates the quotient between two numbers.
member.param: The list of comma separated integers.
member.returns: The result when you divide the two numbers in the array.

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.ArithmeticOps.OverallModulo(System.String)
member.summary: Making sure to have the modulo operation coded for the project.
member.param: The list of integers.
member.returns: The result of the modulo operation.

member.name: T:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.GeometricOps
member.summary: This class represents all of the possible operations that this bot could do that belong to the Geometric category.

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.GeometricOps.CalculateDiscriminant(System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the discriminant given three integers, a value for A, a value for B, and a value for C.
member.param: The three integers.

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.GeometricOps.CalculateQuadraticRoots(System.String)
member.summary: Given the values of A, B, and C this function will then calculate the necessary roots of for the equation Ax^2+Bx+C = 0.
member.param: The values of a, b, and c.
member.returns: A string that contains the roots.

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.GeometricOps.CalculatePythagoreanTriple(System.String)
member.summary: Given the values of two legs in a right triangle, this function will actually calculate the value of the hypotenuse.
member.param: The values of the two legs.
member.returns: A string that would list out the Pythagorean Triple.

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.GeometricOps.CalculateMidpoint(System.String)
member.summary: Method that would calculate the midpoint of a line segment.
member.param: 4 integers that would represent the 2 sets of coordinates.

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.GeometricOps.CalculateDistance(System.String)
member.summary: Having the method to calculate the distance between 2 points.
member.param: The two points in a geometric space.

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.GeometricOps.CalculateHypotenuse(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Method to calculate the hypotenuse.
member.param: First leg of the right triangle.
Second leg of the right triangle.
member.returns: A double value that represents the hypotenuse.

member.name: T:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.StatisticalOps
member.summary: This class represents all of the operations that are classified under the statistical category.

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.StatisticalOps.CalculateAverage(System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the mean of the list of numbers.
member.param: Comma separated list of numbers.
member.returns: The mean (or average) of the list.

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.StatisticalOps.CalculateMedian(System.String)
member.summary: Method to find the middle of the list of integers, also known as the median.
member.param: The list of integers that are separated by a comma.

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.StatisticalOps.CalculateMode(System.String)
member.summary: This function will now calculate the mode of the list of integers.
member.param: List of comma separated integers.
member.returns: The mode - either 0, one single value, or multiple integer values.

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.StatisticalOps.CalculateRange(System.String)
member.summary: This method will be calculate the range in the list of numbers that is provided by the user
member.param: The list of integers that the user provides
member.returns: The difference between the largest and smallest elements in the list of integers

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.StatisticalOps.CalculateVariance(System.String)
member.summary: Method that would calculate the variance of a list of numbers that are provided to the library
member.param: The list of integers

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.StatisticalOps.CalculateStandardDeviation(System.String)
member.summary: Method that calculates the standard deviation
member.param: The list of integers
member.returns: Standard deviation of the list of numbers

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.StatisticalOps.CalculateGeometricMean(System.String)
member.summary: Method that calculates the Geometric Mean
member.param: The list of numbers
member.returns: The geometric mean of the list

member.name: M:CalculatorChatBot.Operations.StatisticalOps.CalculateRootMeanSquare(System.String)
member.summary: Function to calculate the root mean square among a set of numbers
member.param: The list of numbers that are being provided to the bot
member.returns: The root mean square of the list
